Posts.Content: Hi, my advice is pretty similar that you should call them and let them know. Make sure that the info you give them is logged. Me and my late husband were 'golden oldie' reps and we had to do hospital visits as part of our duties and you wouldnt believe the problems that were encountered by our guests just because they didnt let their insurance companies know. It may only take a phone call to sort it out. NOT that you are a 'golden oldie' ................!!!!!!!
Posts.Title: dilemma, to declare or not?

Posts.Content: Hi amsml just read your post, three years on and all is well. Hopefully the pain is old age and muscular. Its so hard not to worry, but wont do you any good too, just look forward to your holiday, all the very bestÂ  love jmd xx
Posts.Title: pain in ribs and trying not to go mad

Posts.Content: Dear suzie we are going back almost forty years and the survival rate then wasnt good. My mum didnt have the opportunity to have chemotherapy, it was on a wing and a prayer. So the survival rate now is much much higher with all the medical advances thank god. All the very best wishes jmd xxx
Posts.Title: Age 37 shock at breast clinic yesterday. totally dazed and reeling...

Posts.Content: Well said Pat, even though its the samw for you too. I wish you the very best of luck. Good luck for wednesday. As you say quite rightly they should have done a biopsy earler, but lets hope you will have a good outcome. Cuddles for you too, xx
Posts.Title: Age 37 shock at breast clinic yesterday. totally dazed and reeling...

Posts.Content: Dear Beckie My mum had breast cancer when she was 46 years of age. Had a masectomy and she is still here with us now at the age of 82 nearly 83 years of age. So dont give up hope my love. jmdxxxx
Posts.Title: New to all this .....

Posts.Content: Well done. Good luck and very best wishes. xxx
Posts.Title: New to all this .....

Posts.Content: Dear suzie and all If there is any questions you want to ask about how my mum got on all those years ago. Feel free to ask away. If I can help at all it would be a pleasure. xxx
Posts.Title: New to all this .....

Posts.Content: Hi to all you ladies, just a quick post. My mum had a masectomy when she was just 46 years of age. She is a survivor, she was 83 years of age this month!!!! Good luck and best wishes for you all xxxxx
Posts.Title: Age 37 shock at breast clinic yesterday. totally dazed and reeling...
